ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description: The opposing Pok√©mon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.
